name: Denim
description: Classic denim jacket, perfect for casual wear.

name: Leather
description: Classic black or brown leather jacket for a bold, stylish look.

name: Rain Jacket
description: Waterproof, perfect for wet weather.

name: Wind breaker
description: Lightweight, designed to block wind and light rain.

name: Black Suit
description: Smart two-piece suit with a modern fit, suitable for formal and business occasions.

name: Burgundy Suit
description: Smart two-piece suit with a modern fit, suitable for formal and business occasions.

name: Plain T-Shirt
description: Simple and comfortable plain T-shirt available in black, navy, and off-white. Perfect for everyday casual wear or layering under jackets and shirts.

name: Mona Lisa T-Shirt
description: Stylish black T-shirt featuring a centered Mona Lisa print. Made from soft cotton, perfect for art lovers and casual outfits.

name: Graphic Streetwear T-Shirt
description: Modern streetwear-style T-shirt with bold front graphic print. Lightweight and comfortable, ideal for casual or urban looks.

name: Striped Casual T-Shirt
description: Casual striped T-shirt available in blue-white or red-white patterns. Breathable fabric for a relaxed, everyday style.

name: Black Hoodie
description: Warm and soft black hoodie with front pocket.

name: Zip-Up Hoodie
description: Comfortable zip-up hoodie available in grey and charcoal. Soft fabric with front pockets and adjustable hood.

name: Blue Graphic Hoodie
description: Stylish blue hoodie with front graphic print. Great for casual wear with a pop of color.

name: Beige Oversized Hoodie
description: Cozy oversized hoodie in beige and cream tones. Soft fleece interior for a relaxed and comfy fit.

name: Classic Collared Shirt
description: Formal button-up shirt with a crisp collar. Perfect for office wear or formal occasions.

name: Casual No-Collar Shirt
description: Relaxed no-collar shirt made from soft fabric. Great for casual outings or summer days.

name: Formal Black Trousers
description: Classic black and navy trousers designed for formal and office wear. Made from premium stretch fabric for comfort.

name: Grey Joggers
description: Soft cotton joggers perfect for lounging or light workouts. Features drawstring waist and side pockets.

name: Blue Slim-Fit Jeans
description: Classic slim-fit jeans with a modern cut. Durable denim with a comfortable fit for everyday wear.

name: Cargo Pants
description: Trendy cargo pants featuring multiple pockets. Ideal for casual and streetwear looks.

name: White Sneakers
description: Classic white sneakers for everyday wear. Lightweight and comfortable with durable rubber soles.

name: Black Running Shoes
description: Breathable running shoes with cushioned soles for maximum comfort and performance.

name: Brown Leather Boots
description: Durable leather boots suitable for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Slip-On Canvas Shoes
description: Comfortable and easy-to-wear canvas slip-ons, perfect for daily casual use.

name: Black Leather Belt
description: Classic leather belt with silver buckle. Pairs well with jeans and trousers.

name: Baseball Cap
description: Adjustable cotton baseball cap available in multiple colors.

name: Silver Wristwatch
description: Stylish stainless steel wristwatch with a minimalist design.

name: Canvas Backpack
description: Durable canvas backpack with multiple compartments for everyday use.

name: Black Tie
description: Classic formal tie designed to be worn with suits and dress shirts.

name: Burgundy Tie
description: Classic formal tie designed to be worn with suits and dress shirts.

name: Ankle Socks Pack (3 Pairs)
description: Soft cotton ankle socks in a pack of 3. Ideal for sports or daily wear.

name: Patterned Crew Socks
description: Fun patterned crew socks made from breathable fabric for all-day comfort.

name: Wool Winter Socks
description: Thick wool socks designed to keep your feet warm in cold weather.

name: No-Show Socks (Pack of 3)
description: Comfortable no-show socks perfect for sneakers and casual shoes.
